translation.zh: 我们希望全世界那些为人们

translation.en: and any form of entertainment for people in the world follow our lead.
translation.zh: 提供成人娱乐或是任何形式娱乐的人也能跟上我们的脚步

translation.en: Has MindGeek or any of its at least 48 subsidiaries
translation.zh: MindGeek或其旗下的至少48个子公司

translation.en: ever monetized child sexual abuse and non-consensual material?
translation.zh: 是否利用过儿童性虐待或是非自愿的素材牟利？

translation.en: Our standards are very clear. We won't allow anything to do with CSAM.
translation.zh: 我们的标准十分明确我们不允许任何儿童性虐待素材

translation.en: We want nothing to do with non-consensual.
translation.zh: 或是任何非自愿的东西

translation.en: It is possible that people committing crimes
translation.zh: 如果某些犯罪人士绕过了我们的系统

translation.en: are able to circumvent our systems,
translation.zh: 那是有可能的

translation.en: similar to security on a home or security at a bank.
translation.zh: 就像是家庭安防系统或是银行的安保系统

translation.en: You put multiple levels of security in place and deterrents in place,
translation.zh: 虽然你已设置了层层的安全措施与阻遏手段

translation.en: but if a criminal wants to commit a crime, they will try and circumvent the system.
translation.zh: 可如果有罪犯想要犯罪 他们会想办法绕过这个系统

translation.en: We are constantly adding new systems and better systems
translation.zh: 我们一直在增加新的系统与更好的系统

translation.en: and trying to further it, to not only deter but to stop.
translation.zh: 精益求精 不仅要阻遏还要追求完全阻断

translation.en: This has been a constant evolution in our company.
translation.zh: 这是我们公司内不断进化的一部分

translation.en: We were, um… had human moderation available on our sites
translation.zh: 我们的网站上很早就有了人工审核

translation.en: when it was a word that wasn't even-- It didn't even exist.
translation.zh: 那时候这个词本身都还不存在

translation.en: When Facebook and any of the other main platforms in the world never used it.
translation.zh: 那时候Facebook和世界上其他主流平台也从仍未应用

translation.en: These were all things that we started. We weren't public about it,
translation.zh: 这些都是我们最先开始做的我们只是没有公开而已

translation.en: but these are things we did since the beginning.
translation.zh: 但这些都是我们从一开始就在做的事

translation.en: [Perdue] There were moderators.
translation.zh: 以前确实有审核员

translation.en: I don't really know how that worked.
translation.zh: 我不知道具体是怎么个机制

translation.en: I know that there was
translation.zh: 我知道原来…

translation.en: more content being uploaded onto the site, so I actually can't talk, really.
translation.zh: 有更多的内容被上传到网站上 抱歉 我不能讲这个

translation.en: This is really getting into shady legal territory for me here.
translation.zh: 再说下去我可能会有法律上的麻烦了

translation.en: -[interviewer] Okay. -Um…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [interviewer] To start, can you just tell me why you've decided
translation.zh: 首先 能否请你告诉我 你为什么决定要分享你的故事？

translation.en: to share your story?
translation.zh: 你为什么决定要分享你的故事？

translation.en: I think the company could have done more
translation.zh: 我认为公司本可以做得更多

translation.en: to prevent certain things and chose not to.
translation.zh: 来阻止某些事 却选择了不这么做

translation.en: And only really changed some things after it got in trouble.
translation.zh: 只有在惹了麻烦后才做出了些许改变

translation.en: [voice disguised] I was a moderator. I worked for less than two years.
translation.zh: 我以前是一名审核员 我工作了不到两年

translation.en: Some of the moderation happened in Canada.
translation.zh: 有一些审核工作是在加拿大进行的

translation.en: Most of it happened in Cyprus.
translation.zh: 而绝大部分都是在塞浦路斯

translation.en: When I worked there, there was a little over 30 moderators.
translation.zh: 我在那里工作的时候大概有30多个审核员

translation.en: Every moderator had to review, um, 700 videos per day,
translation.zh: 每个审核员每天要审查700个视频

translation.en: but it was expected for us to do more.
translation.zh: 但那只是我们的及格线

translation.en: [Pinter] Each of these moderators were tasked with viewing
translation.zh: 每个审核员的职责是在8小时工作时间内

translation.en: 800 to 1,000 videos per eight-hour shift.
translation.zh: 每个审核员的职责是在8小时工作时间内 观看完800到1000个视频

translation.en: And that's impossible.
translation.zh: 那是不可能做到的

translation.en: So, of course, they were fast-forwarding, skipping through.
translation.zh: 所以他们当然会一直快进 跳着看

translation.en: No sound, which is key because sometimes
translation.zh: 不开声音 这点挺关键的 因为有时候视频里的女人和儿童在哭嚎和喊叫

translation.en: the women and-- or children in the video are crying, yelling,
translation.zh: 因为有时候视频里的女人和儿童在哭嚎和喊叫

translation.en: saying, "No," saying, "Stop," and they're not catching any of that.
translation.zh: 说着“不要”和“停”他们是一点也不会听到的

translation.en: [moderator] We were scrubbing through videos as fast as we could.
translation.zh: 我们都是尽可能快地跳进着看视频的

translation.en: Even if we thought that we were being diligent with our work,
translation.zh: 即便我们自以为已经够谨慎了

translation.en: we would still miss a few videos every now and then.
translation.zh: 还是会偶尔错过几个视频

translation.en: [Pinter] They proudly boasted that every single video is reviewed.
translation.zh: 他们得意地吹嘘每一个视频都是被审阅过的

translation.en: But, to put it in perspective,
translation.zh: 但类比一下的话

translation.en: Pornhub has traffic similar to these big social media websites.
translation.zh: Pornhub的浏览量跟那些大型社交媒体网站是差不多的

translation.en: Ninth, you know, most-trafficked website in the world, conservatively.
translation.zh: 保守估计是全世界流量第九的网站

translation.en: Facebook had 15,000 moderators,
translation.zh: Facebook有一万五千名审核员

translation.en: and that was for a site that isn't primarily centered around sexually explicit content, right?
translation.zh: 而且那还是给一家不主打色情露骨内容的网站 对吧？

translation.en: And they still have 15,000 moderators who, we find out, are very overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 即便如此 也有一万五千名审核员而且我们得知他们也忙不过来

translation.en: [moderator] I can't really tell from a video the age of somebody.
translation.zh: 我无法依靠视频判断出某人的年龄

translation.en: It's a really hard thing to determine if a 17 year old is more than 18.
translation.zh: 但我们还是必须要做决定这个人是17岁呢 还是超过了18岁

translation.en: They could be 14 or they could be 19.
translation.zh: 他们有可能14岁 也有可能19岁

translation.en: Basically, we would just guess,
translation.zh: 基本上我们只能靠猜

translation.en: then my manager would decide if the video would be
translation.zh: 然后会由我的经理来决定要不要把这个视频永久地撤下来

translation.en: taken down for good or if it will go live again.
translation.zh: 然后会由我的经理来决定要不要把这个视频永久地撤下来 还是让它重新上线

translation.en: The rules constantly changed.
translation.zh: 规则总是在不断地变化

translation.en: [woman] When you're operating a business like a pornography website,
translation.zh: 当你在经营一门像色情网站这样的生意时

translation.en: you just have to have incredibly stringent compliance, content moderation,
translation.zh: 你必须非常严格地遵从规则进行内容审核

translation.en: and user restrictions involved in that.
translation.zh: 还有限制与之相关的用户

translation.en: I can't overstate that enough, especially when it's an online business.
translation.zh: 这些我就算再怎么强调也不过分尤其是讨论一家网络企业的时候

translation.en: So NCMEC is a private, nonprofit organization.
translation.zh: NCMEC是一个私有的非营利组织

translation.en: We have a very basic mission, which is to help find missing children,
translation.zh: 我们有一个非常基本的使命就是帮助寻找失踪的儿童

translation.en: reduce child sexual exploitation, and prevent child victimization.
translation.zh: 减少对儿童的性剥削阻止儿童成为受害者

translation.en: We've a lot of companies and nonprofit organizations that report to us.
translation.zh: 有许多公司和非营利组织会向我们汇报

translation.en: So a survivor very well might be working with an organization
translation.zh: 如果有名幸存者很可能已经在找某个组织帮忙了

translation.en: and say, "My image, my video, is here, on Pornhub, on another website."
translation.zh: 他说：“我的照片、我的视频在Pornhub或者其他网站上”

translation.en: And we would facilitate that nonprofit making a report on that incident
translation.zh: 我们会帮助那个非营利组织代表那名客户或是在帮助的幸存者

translation.en: on behalf of the client or survivor that they're working with.
translation.zh: 写一份关于这起事件的报告

translation.en: [Pinter] So a survivor came to us with what happened to her.
translation.zh: 有一名幸存者来找我们在她身上发生了这么件事

translation.en: She went on a date with someone who was much older.
translation.zh: 她跟一名比她年长许多的人约了次会

translation.en: She was a minor.
translation.zh: 她当时是个未成年人

translation.en: He drugged and raped her and filmed her.
translation.zh: 他给她下了药 强奸了她 还录了下来

translation.en: And the next thing you know, the video is on Pornhub.
translation.zh: 然后这个视频马上就跑到Pornhub上去了 （被骗的少女）

translation.en: She requested multiple times over the years to have it removed.
translation.zh: 多年来她多次请求将视频移除

translation.en: But the whistleblower we spoke to
translation.zh: 但跟我们联络的吹哨人说

translation.en: actually said that they would have a backlog of, like, six months.
translation.zh: 但跟我们联络的吹哨人说 他们时常手上积压着六个月的工作量

translation.en: [moderator] We have thousands of take-down requests.
translation.zh: 我们会收到成千上万的移除请求

translation.en: We don't really go through them in time.
translation.zh: 我们没办法及时看完

translation.en: Many videos that should have been taken down
translation.zh: 许多应该被移除的视频

translation.en: stayed up for months.
translation.zh: 会在上面待上好几个月

translation.en: [Souras] So there is a US law that requires online companies
translation.zh: 有一条美国法律要求 所有网络公司从定义上说 是电子服务提供商

translation.en: that are defined as an electronic service provider
translation.zh: 所有网络公司从定义上说 是电子服务提供商

translation.en: to report apparent child pornography to NCMEC
translation.zh: 一经发现明显是儿童色情作品的素材

translation.en: when they become aware of it on their platform.
translation.zh: 必须立即向NCMEC报告

translation.en: There are over 1400 companies registered with NCMEC.
translation.zh: 超过1400家公司在NCMEC注册了

translation.en: From Microsoft, to Facebook, to Google, to Dropbox, to Snapchat, to Twitter,
translation.zh: 从微软到Facebook从谷歌到Dropbox 到Snapchat 到Twitter

translation.en: all of these companies are registered with NCMEC.
translation.zh: 所有这些公司 都在NCMEC注册了

translation.en: And MindGeek registered to report to NCMEC in March 2020.
translation.zh: 而MindGeek在注册向NCMEC汇报是在2020年的3月

translation.en: But the reporting statute only applies to US companies.
translation.zh: 但这条报告的法规只对美国公司适用

translation.en: So international companies have no obligation to register with NCMEC,
translation.zh: 所以国际公司没义务要在NCMEC注册

translation.en: to report child sexual abuse, uh, material
translation.zh: 不需要将儿童性虐待的素材

translation.en: to our CyberTipline or to have any involvement with us whatsoever.
translation.zh: 报告给我们的电子举报系统或是跟我们有任何关系

translation.en: [Pinter] What Pornhub would do when NCMEC would request a takedown is…
translation.zh: 当NCMEC要求下架视频时Pornhub会这么做…

translation.en: In any other circumstance, if child pornography was on a website,
translation.zh: 在其他情况下如果网站上有儿童色情作品

translation.en: and the website was alerted, and they took it down,
translation.zh: 而这家网站也意识到了他们把视频撤下后

translation.en: and you tried to go to that link, to that exact web address,
translation.zh: 如果你再试图去访问那个链接访问一模一样的网址

translation.en: it either wouldn't be there or it'd say, "Page doesn't exist" or "Error."
translation.zh: 要不就是视频不在了要不就是“页面不存在”或是“错误”

translation.en: For Pornhub, you would see the entire page.
translation.zh: 而在Pornhub上你能看到整个页面都在

translation.en: The video would just be disabled, and it would have a message that says,
translation.zh: 视频只是被禁止播放了上面会有条信息写道：

translation.en: "Video is removed at the request of NCMEC."
translation.zh: “视频根据NCMEC要求已被移除”

translation.en: But all the metadata would be there.
translation.zh: 可所有的元数据都仍然在

translation.en: So you would see the title, the history of all the comments over the years,
translation.zh: 就是说你能看到标题 看到历史还有多年来所有的评论

translation.en: you'd see how many views it had, and you would see related videos.
translation.zh: 你能看到这个视频有多少阅览量还能看到相关视频

translation.en: So, "Oh, you were searching for this young, abused teen video?"
translation.zh: “噢 你在搜索这个被虐待的年轻少女的视频呀？”

translation.en: "Well, unfortunately, this was removed by NCMEC,
translation.zh: “哎呀 太可惜 已经被NCMEC移除了

translation.en: but don't worry, we have all of these similar videos."
translation.zh: 但请你别担心我们这里还有许多类似的视频”

translation.en: And so, not only would they keep people on their site,
translation.zh: 这样一来他们不仅把人留在了网站上

translation.en: but that would still be generating data and hits on all those terms and keywords.
translation.zh: 但那个视频依旧会创造数据跟许多关键词搭配上

translation.en: So they lost nothing in terms of SEO by removing that.
translation.zh: 所以尽管他们移除了视频但在搜索引擎优化方面什么也没失去

translation.en: So they're actually still profiting from this known child pornography
translation.zh: 他们依旧在依靠这个确定的儿童色情作品牟利

translation.en: even when they disable the video.
translation.zh: 即便他们禁止了视频的播放

translation.en: And all the while, it's being distributed to the masses,
translation.zh: 而在此过程中 视频正在发布给大众

translation.en: never to be removed again.
translation.zh: 再也别想被移除了

translation.en: Because that's the truth.
translation.zh: 因为这就是事实

translation.en: Once this is on the Internet, it's almost impossible to remove.
translation.zh: 一旦这东西被放上了网络就几乎不可能被删除掉了

translation.en: These websites face no accountability, no requirements.
translation.zh: 这些网站不负责任 没有要求

translation.en: They are not motivated to remove content,
translation.zh: 他们可没有动力要移除内容

translation.en: and so even if you get some websites to remove,
translation.zh: 所以即便你成功地让某几家网站移除

translation.en: others are going to distribute it.
translation.zh: 其他的网站还是会继续传播

translation.en: Serena, thank you so much for being willing to come to our committee and to tell your story.
translation.zh: 塞琳娜 非常感谢你愿意来到我们的委员会面前讲出自己的故事

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with you.
translation.zh: 我们先从你开始

translation.en: I… I had messaged Pornhub to get the video taken down.
translation.zh: 我给Pornhub发信息要求将视频撤下来

translation.en: I pretended to be my mother.
translation.zh: 我假装是我的母亲

translation.en: And I said, "Hey, this is my daughter. She's only 14 now."
translation.zh: 我说：“嘿 刚才是我的女儿她今年只有14岁””

translation.en: "Uh, this is child pornography. Please take this down."
translation.zh: “这是儿童色情作品请把它撤下来”

translation.en: And they, you know, they wrote-- It took like a week or two to respond,
translation.zh: 然后他们…他们回…花了一两周时间才回应

translation.en: and then once they finally responded, they're like, "Okay, we'll take it down."
translation.zh: 等他他们终于回复的时候他们说：“好的 我们会把它下架”

translation.en: And then proceeded to wait another two weeks
translation.zh: 接着他们又等上了两周

translation.en: before they finally did take it down.
translation.zh: 最后才终于将视频下架了

translation.en: And, um, doing my research, I was told that, uh,
translation.zh: 我自己在调研的时候 我听说

translation.en: that they had a system in place
translation.zh: 他们有一套系统

translation.en: that when a video was labeled as "child pornography" on their site,
translation.zh: 当某个视频在他们网站上被标记为“儿童色情作品”时

translation.en: that it was, like, flagged and tagged
translation.zh: 视频会被拿出来做标记

translation.en: and that it could no longer be re-uploaded.
translation.zh: 同样的视频就永远也无法上传了

translation.en: Um, but of course, that wasn't true
translation.zh: 不过当然了 根本不是这样的

translation.en: because a week after it had been taken down,
translation.zh: 因为在视频被下架后的一周后

translation.en: it had been re-uploaded again.
translation.zh: 它又被重新上传了

translation.en: And it'd always be uploaded over and over and over again.
translation.zh: 然后就这样一遍又一遍地上传

translation.en: No matter how many times I got it taken down,
translation.zh: 无论我让它下架多少回

translation.en: it'd be right back up again.
translation.zh: 立马又会被传上去

translation.en: [sniffs] So that was the whole reason I ended up reaching out to Mike.
translation.zh: 所以 这就是我最后联络麦克的原因

translation.en: Thank you. Um… I'll just introduce myself briefly to the committee.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我先向委员会做个简短的自我介绍

translation.en: My name is Michael Bowe.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫迈克尔·鲍伊

translation.en: Uh, I'm a partner in Manhattan at the law firm of Brown Rudnick.
translation.zh: 我是位于曼哈顿的布朗鲁德尼克律师事务所的合伙人

translation.en: [anchor] More than 30 women have filed a lawsuit against Pornhub.
translation.zh: 已有超过30名女性对Pornhub发起了诉讼

translation.en: The women are accusing the adult website
translation.zh: 她们指控该成人网站

translation.en: of running a "criminal enterprise" and exploiting them for profit.
translation.zh: 是在经营一家“犯罪企业”依靠剥削她们牟利

translation.en: [continues via phone] Lawyer Michael Bowe represents the women taking on MindGeek.
translation.zh: 迈克尔·鲍伊律师代表这些女性对阵MindGeek

translation.en: He spent the past year building a civil case against the company,
translation.zh: 他在过去的一年中一直在为民事诉讼该公司搜集证据

translation.en: citing racketeering laws ordinarily reserved for mobsters and drug gangs.
translation.zh: 以通常针对黑帮与贩毒集团的非法勾当法为基础

translation.en: [Bowe] This is an organization that deals with legitimate porn,
translation.zh: 这个组织销售的是真正的色情片

translation.en: of which there is a… You can make a fortune.
translation.zh: 靠这个你可以发大财

translation.en: Uh, but that wasn't enough.
translation.zh: 但这还不够

translation.en: They incorporated into that business
translation.zh: 他们在商业模型中融入了

translation.en: child porn, trafficked porn, rape videos… To make money.
translation.zh: 儿童色情作品、性贩卖作品还有强奸视频来赚钱

translation.en: So today, we sued the owners of MindGeek, and we sued the executives.
translation.zh: 所以今天我们起诉了MindGeek的老板和高管

translation.en: And if executives like that end up going to jail,
translation.zh: 如果像这样的高管最后进了监狱

translation.en: and end up having to pay big judgments,
translation.zh: 最后付出了大笔的赔款

translation.en: that will make a big difference.
translation.zh: 那将会带来很大的改变

translation.en: So our goal is to incentivize the adult industry
translation.zh: 所以我们的目标是激励 成人产业只销售合法产品

translation.en: to only sell legitimate product.
translation.zh: 成人产业只销售合法产品

translation.en: [interviewer] Is this a moment of reckoning for the online porn industry?
translation.zh: 对网络色情业来说这是一个分水岭吗？

translation.en: This industry is going to get cleaned up.
translation.zh: 整个行业都将被整治

translation.en: Hello, Mike Bowe.
translation.zh: 喂 迈克·鲍伊

translation.en: Hello. Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: And did they get taken down, or are they still up there?
translation.zh: 它们被下架了吗？还是依旧在上面？

translation.en: We'll call you back within the week.
translation.zh: 我们会在一周内给你回电

translation.en: -[interviewer] Another one? -Yeah. It's a tough one. It's a mother.
translation.zh: 又来一个？ 是啊 这个难办 是个妈妈

translation.en: You know, this advocate Laila Mickelwait, who was like a one-woman wrecking crew,
translation.zh: 这个拥护者莱拉·米科威特一个人就是一支娘子军

translation.en: it was her and a Twitter feed.
translation.zh: 她一个人加上Twitter

translation.en: [all] Shut it down!
translation.zh: 关网站！

translation.en: [Bowe] She just started tweeting stuff out and, you know,
translation.zh: 她只是动动手指将东西发出去 她就是这么一种不可阻挡的力量
